mapper.insert: insert into editorReview_tb (editorReview_reviewId, editorReview_editor, editorReview_writer, editorReview_review, editorReview_score, editorReview_writtenDate) values (#{reviewId}, #{editor}, #{writer}, #{review}, #{score}, #{writtenDate})
mapper.select: select editorReview_reviewId reviewId, editorReview_editor editor, editorReview_writer writer, editorReview_review review, editorReview_score score, editorReview_writtenDate writtenDate from editorReview_tb where editor_name=#{editorName}
